extensionName.description: Name of the extension. Also used for the toolbar button tooltip and for the page/tab context menu item for direct tab restore.

extensionDescription.message: Stellt den zuletzt geschlossenen Tab wieder her.

more_entries_menu.description: Last menu on Context menus of the browser action, as the top-level menu cannot exceed 6 items.

clearlist_menuitem.description: Label for the menuitem for clearing the list of closed tabs

page_contextmenu_submenu.description: The label used for the submenu added to the page/tab context menu (the one with the recently closed tab list). Please use the same string as in 'extensionName' whenever possible!

general_headline.description: Headline for general options in options page

restoreGroup_label.message: Tabs als Gruppe wiederherstellen wenn die Zeit zwischen deren Schließen geringer ist als
restoreGroup_label.description: Label on checkbox for restoring tab groups based on time between tab closes

contextmenus_headline.description: Headline for context menu options in options page

menuitem_number_label.description: Closed tabs number on context menu items.

numberText_title.message: Anzahl von Einträgen in Kontextmenü. Bereich ist 1 - $1

onlycurrent_label.message: Nur geschlossene Tabs des aktuellen Fensters auflisten
onlycurrent_label.description: Label on checkbox for filtering menu items to current window

menuitem_clearlist_label.message: Menüeintrag zum Leeren der Liste von geschlossenen Tabs anzeigen
menuitem_clearlist_label.description: Label on checkbox for enabling the 'Clear List' menu item

menus_headline.description: Headline for additional menu checkboxes in options page

menu_tab_label.description: Label on checkbox to enable submenu in tab bar context menu

menu_page_label.description: Label on checkbox to enable submenu in page context menu

menuitem_page_label.description: Label on checkbox to enable menuitem in page context menu
